file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 29-30-02-05 - PRESSURE TRANSMITTER - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PRESSURE TRANSMITTER - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the operational check of the pressure transmitter. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PRESSURE TRANSMITTER - OPERA- ALL 29-30-02-700-801-A TIONAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 29-30-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 29-30-02-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PRESSURE TRANSMITTER - OPERATIONAL CHECK A. General (1) This section gives the procedure to do the operational check of the pressure transmitter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 193 193BL Hydraulic compartment of system 1 193 193CR Hydraulic compartment of system 2 D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Hydraulic compartment of system 1 and 1 Does the task system 2 I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove access panel(s) 193BL and/or 193CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Energize the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (3) Isolate the operational areas near the landing gear, rudder, spoiler, thrust reverser, ailerons, and flaps. (4) Make sure that, on the circuit breaker panel, the EMDP 1 and/or EMDP 2 circuit breaker(s) is (are) closed. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 29-30-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Make sure that safety pins are installed on the landing gears. J. Operational Check of the Pressure Transmitter (Figure 501) SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Set the switch of the EMDP to on. (2) See the hydraulic pressure on the EICAS. NOTE: The hydraulic pressure must be between 2900 and 3100 psi. (3) Examine the system for leaks. (4) Set the switch of the EMDP to off. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install access panel(s) 193BL and/or 193CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Deenergize the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 29-30-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
